SEARCH
Module RobotGUI
Package application

Class RobotArena

java.lang.Object
application.RobotArena
public class RobotArena extends Object
Class representing the arena where robots are placed and interact.

  • Method Details

    • toggleArena

      public void toggleArena()
      Toggles between maze and regular arena layout. Generates a maze if toggled on, otherwise clears existing obstacles.

    • setArenaSize

      public void setArenaSize(double newWidth, double newHeight)
      Sets the size of the arena.
      Parameters:
      newWidth - The new width of the arena.
      newHeight - The new height of the arena.

    • addRandomObstacle

      public void addRandomObstacle(double obstacleRadius)
      Adds a random obstacle with the specified radius to the arena.
      Parameters:
      obstacleRadius - The radius of the new obstacle.

    • getXSize

      public double getXSize()
      Gets the width of the arena.
      Returns:
      The width of the arena.

    • getYSize

      public double getYSize()
      Gets the height of the arena.
      Returns:
      The height of the arena.

    • drawArena

      public void drawArena(MyCanvas mc)
      Draws the arena, including robots and obstacles.
      Parameters:
      mc - The canvas to draw on.

    • describeAll

      public ArrayList<String> describeAll()
      Provides descriptions of all robots in the arena.
      Returns:
      A list of strings describing all robots.

    • adjustAllRobots

      public void adjustAllRobots()
      Adjusts all robots by moving them, handling collisions with boundaries, other robots, and obstacles.

    • addRobot

      public void addRobot()
      Adds a new basic robot to the arena at the center.

    • addAdRobot

      public void addAdRobot()
      Adds a new advanced robot to the arena at a specific position.

    • addRobott

      public void addRobott(Robot robot)
      Adds a custom robot to the arena.
      Parameters:
      robot - The robot to add.

    • addObstacle

      public void addObstacle(Obstacle obstacle)
      Adds a custom obstacle to the arena.
      Parameters:
      obstacle - The obstacle to add.

    • CheckRobotAngle

      public double CheckRobotAngle(double x, double y, double rad, double ang, int robotID)
      Checks if a robot's angle should be adjusted based on collisions with the arena's boundaries or other robots.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the robot.
      y - The y-coordinate of the robot.
      rad - The radius of the robot.
      ang - The current angle of the robot.
      robotID - The ID of the robot.
      Returns:
      The adjusted angle.

    • checkHit

      public boolean checkHit(Robot target)
      Checks if a specific target robot is being hit by any basic robot.
      Parameters:
      target - The robot to check for a hit.
      Returns:
      True if a basic robot hits the target, false otherwise.

    • getAllRobots

      public ArrayList<Robot> getAllRobots()
      Provides read-only access to the list of all robots in the arena.
      Returns:
      The list of all robots.

    • getObstacles

      public ArrayList<Obstacle> getObstacles()
      Provides read-only access to the list of all obstacles in the arena.
      Returns:
      The list of all obstacles.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the arena's dimensions.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string with the arena dimensions.

    • removeRobot

      public void removeRobot(Robot robot)
      Removes a robot from the arena.
      Parameters:
      robot - The robot to remove.

    • removeObstacle

      public void removeObstacle(Obstacle selectedObstacle)
      Removes a selected obstacle from the arena.
      Parameters:
